SEARCH
Package it.unipv.posfw.orbit.account

Class User

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.posfw.orbit.account.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Publisher
public class User extends Object
represents a standard user in the orbit platform. it contains user credentials, balance, library and ban status.

  • Method Details

    • addGiftCardFunds

      public boolean addGiftCardFunds(String giftCardCode)
      adds funds to the user's balance using a gift card code.
      Parameters:
      giftCardCode - the unique code of the gift card
      Returns:
      true if the gift card is valid and redeemed, false otherwise

    • removeFunds

      public void removeFunds(double amount)
      removes a specific amount of funds from the user's balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - the value to deduct from the balance
